content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”ADR Chambers International provides international dispute resolution based on the UNCITRAL* Arbitration Rules” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28px|text_align:left|line_height:36px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1510162946701{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Arbitrators and Mediators

Select from a roster of international arbitrators and mediators with experience working under the UNCITRAL Arbitration Rules and UNCITRAL Conciliation Rules.

Administration

ADR Chambers International provides complete Registrar services to manage the administration of your dispute, including arbitral tribunal selection, venue and accommodation booking, transcription, and language interpretation.

To find out more, please visit the ADR Chambers International website.

* United Nations Commission on International Trade Law[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_custom_heading text=”Company” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”54″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
